topics.body:
I'm still thinking about the guy in that dream I had

It's weird because when I actually think about him he was kinda generic looking but in the dream he was the most amazing person I'd ever seen. Like just looking at him made me happy

I wish my subconscious would just stick to altering my perception of my dreams in creepy ways rather than teasing me with lovey dovey crap

Also his name was Wayne
What the fuck 
Why is my dream man named fucking Wayne
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
